transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Ya GD Patel ji baat kar rahe Lumen pharmaceutical se?
Customer: Bol raha hu bol raha hu sir ji.
Executive: Sir Vijay Agarwal baat kar raha hu manager India Mart se baat kar raha hu mai.
Customer: Hanji sir.
Executive: Aapka ek company India Mart me aaya tha sir by isko leke sir.
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: To usi ko regarding maine aapko call kiya sir.
Customer: Um abhi to India Mart me itna to hum happy hai nahi sir.
Executive: Sorry.
Customer: Kyunki sara package hamara pehle aapka jo colleagues aaye the waha pe meri company me.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: To maine sari complaint ki thi isse pehle bhi bahut sari complaint ki thi.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Lekin isme hame wo result nahi mil raha tha.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To abhi to socha nahi hai lekin mai aapko approach karunga sir samne se.
Executive: Nahi jo aapne complaint kiye maine uske regarding call kiya maine aapko sir issue jo aap face kar rahe India Mart se usko theek karne ke liye call kiya maine aapko sir koi nayi service ke liye call nahi kiya maine aapko sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo wo to koi aapka colleagues ka phone aaya tha sir.
Executive: Achcha kab aaya tha call?
Customer: Shayad ek hafte pehle.
Executive: Wo Suchi ka call aaya hoga aapke paas Suchi ka.
Customer: Ha naam to mujhe sir yaad nahi hai lekin call aaya tha sir.
Executive: Nahi Suchi ka call aayega wo aapko video meeting pe baat hua hoga na Maxima ke bare me bataya tha unhone aapko.
Customer: Ha ha ha ha ha.
Executive: Hai na Suchi ne call kiya tha aapke account manager hai sir wo.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: To unhone aapko call kiya tha sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Aur ye aapka ek mail hamare paas aaya tha to jaha pe aapne likha tha ki no buylead receive to our product looking for improvement and taking.
Customer: Kab aaya?
Executive: 9 tarikh 9 tarikh ko aaya hai.
Customer: Ye 9 tarikh ko mila hai mai mai mere colleague se baat kar leta hu mail.
Executive: Achcha complaint ke bare me kya hai?
Executive: Leads ka beja tha ki hamare product me add nahi hai par aayi hai do char leads ke bare me mention kiya unhone.
Customer: Achcha to mai ek Aniket ka number aap likh lo sir.
Executive: Ek second sir ek second.
Customer: Hanji bataiye sir.
Executive: Ek minute sir. Hanji.
Customer: Ah likhiye sir.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Ah 97277
Executive: 97277
Customer: 20362
Executive: 9727720362. Yes sir.
Customer: Aniket ji se baat kariye please. Aniket Aniket.
Executive: Hanji hanji sir. Thik hai ji mai baat karta hu unse. Okay ji thank you ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not happy with IndiaMART services.

- Facing issues with the current package.

- No results from the current subscription.

- No buyleads received for products.



Resolution:

- Executive called to address complaints.

- Provided Aniket's number for further assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact Aniket.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Negative | Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaints, buyleads, account manager, resolution
